## ContractEvent type

Standardized return type for contract events that returns event arguments

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ContractEvent = {
    eventName: string;
    data: Record<string, unknown>;
    transaction: Omit<providers.Log, "args">;
};
```
